creator: Super Hero Holding
descriptionHtml:
With TapNow, no matter where you are, you can start a new journey instantly! Tap It Now!
TapNow provides information about the most popular check-in locations and good places for family, whether it is Staycation hotel accommodation packages, premium restaurants, buffet dining discounts, famous observation decks, theme park tickets, DIY workshop experiences or spas, you can easily book in TapNow.

Download TapNow now to receive the latest popular events and exclusive limited-time offers!
- Book accommodation, dining and other fun experiences at the best price
- Get local Staycation, hotel accommodation, dining vouchers, buffets, park tickets and various themed event packages
- Discover the latest information on popular check-in locations in Hong Kong, Café, High Tea, Spa, local tours and guided tours

Core Functions
- Clear classification, easy to search for various accommodation, dining and activity experiences.
- Simple and straightforward booking process, you will receive the QR code after completing the order, and you can complete the redemption by using the TapNow App.
- Live map location function, let you know the exact location of the experience
- Support Apple Pay and all kinds of credit cards, use 3D Secure encryption authentication, so you have no worries when booking and enjoying trips or services.
- The membership system can keep all the past booking records. One App in hand, no need to print the voucher.

Official website: https://www.tapnow.com
Facebook: TapNow.com
Instagram: tapnow.hk

Users' opinions are the driving force for our improvement. We will continue to bring more new features to our users. Welcome to leave comments or email them to info@tapnow.com.
descriptionShort: TapNow is an online booking platform for local hotels, restaurant & experiences.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Join TapNow to explore more local fun.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1.Support “scan to redeem all” voucher QR code
2.Click to enlarge product and plan pictures. Come and check our amazing products.
3.Improved add credit card flow
4.Cached user info during checkout flow to automatic fill in next time
5.A reminder for you when you are accidentally leaving the purchase flow.
6.Bug fixes and improvements
